text: Labo abanilindile (abanibhekile) uma ninokunqoba okuvela kuMvelinqangi bathi “Asizange yini sibe kanye nani na”? Kepha uma abangakholwa bevelelwe yinhlanhla bathi (kubona) asizange yini sibe ngaphezulu kwenu ngokunqoba futhi asizange yini sinivikele kwabakholwayo na? Ngakho- ke uMvelinqangi uyokwahlulela phakathi kwenu ngosuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo futhi uMvelinqangi akasoze wenzela abangakholwa indlela (yokunqoba) abakholwayo
